RelatedSentence: Russian President Vladimir Putin said on Monday that he has ordered Russian troops to pull out of three towns bordering Ukraine , though NATO members say they see no evidence of the movement .

According to a statement released by the Kremlin , troops that had been performing exercises at the border towns of Rostov , Bryansk , and Belgorod were ordered to return to their places of permanent deployment .
